ProviderType.description: The name of the external provider where your third-party code repository is configured.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID for the repository associated with a specific sync configuration, such as the owner ID in GitHub.

RepositoryName.description: The name of the repository that is being synced to.

description: Information, such as repository, branch, provider, and resource names for a specific sync configuration.

Branch.description: The branch associated with a specific sync configuration.

ConfigFile.description: The file path to the configuration file associated with a specific sync configuration. The path should point to an actual file in the sync configurations linked repository.

PublishDeploymentStatus.description: Whether to enable or disable publishing of deployment status to source providers.

RepositoryLinkId.description: The ID of the repository link associated with a specific sync configuration.

ResourceName.description: The name of the connection resource associated with a specific sync configuration.

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with a specific sync configuration.

SyncType.description: The type of sync for a specific sync configuration.

TriggerResourceUpdateOn.description: When to trigger Git sync to begin the stack update.
